title: Cannot Reply or Forward from the Message List
content:
When I click on a message from the list of messages in my inbox (Message List, or perhaps also called Thread Pane), I'm unable to select "Reply," "Reply All," or "Forward" without opening that email. I've tried multiple ways, and none of them work: - Keyboard shortcut (Ctrl-R or Ctrl-L) - Menu item 

  -- Message > Reply   -- Message > Forward

- Right click, then select Reply or Forward - Customized menu -- buttons for Reply and Forward

Other keyboard shortcuts/menu items work from the Message List, including compose new message, open, delete, tag, forward as attachment, etc.

When I open the Message Pane (F8), I am able to reply and forward from the Message List using all of the above methods. But I don't want the Message Pane displayed.

When i opened TB in "troubleshooting mode," the problem persisted. I don't have any extensions installed.

I searched and searched and couldn't find anyone else asking this question, so I'm hoping someone here can help.

Thank you!
creator: tdn

title: 为什么邮件发不出去，总是有弹窗

title: 썬더버드 이메일 계정 생성 시 stmp 서버 설정 오류
content:
도메인 구입 후 해당 도메인으로 썬더버드 프로그램에서 메일 주소를 개설하여 사용하고자 합니다. 서버 등을 다 입력했음에도 불구하고 메일 전송이 정상적으로 되지 않고 보내는 서버, 받는 서버 오류가 뜨는 것 같은데 추가 설정이 필요한 부분이 있는지 구체적으로 확인을 받고 싶습니다.

메일 계정은 furuya@ctivt.kr 입니다.
creator: mskk102477
